result.ga: sibhse a chuir tús leis an chogadh
result.orig: Sibhse a chuir tús leis an chogadh
result.html: sibhse a chuir tús leis an chogadhYou started the war.
result.ponchtml: siḃse a ċuir tús leis an ċogaḋYou started the war.

result.eng: Those of you who fear God.

result.html: sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla déThose of you who fear God.
